name: Jojo's Delivery Service
description:
Jojo is lost in a city they don't know, with no money left to buy the boat ticket to its intended journey. Luckily, the Town Mayor has a solution: since Kiki, the town's official delivery girl is sick, Jojo can fulfil her duties! 

All that's left to do is interact with the townspeople and help them with their tasks to make some money and afford the boat ticket! Embark on this journey, and discover the city and its citizens in this Ghibli inspired adventure!
